body: Three phase method doesn't have direct sun calculation. Daylight coefficient and 5 phase does (note that currently in 5phase we don't currently use tensortree xml files for the fifth phase and hence the direct sun contribution is diffused!). In short daylight coefficient method is the best for studying direct vs diffuse contribution. To answer the original question check out the mode input. It is available both for grid-based and image-based analysis. If there is no direct value (e.g. 3-phase calculation) it will return 0 for all the hours.
